channel.title: CVE Feed for pickplugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pickplugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43321|2024-08-18T14:13:54.780Z -- pickplugins -- team%20showcase
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Team Showcase allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Team Showcase: from n/a through 1.22.23.

item.title: CVE-2024-43155|2024-08-14T14:14:18.172Z -- pickplugins -- comboblocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins ComboBlocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ComboBlocks: from n/a through 2.2.86.

item.title: CVE-2024-43155|2024-08-12T22:06:59.155Z -- pickplugins -- comboblocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins ComboBlocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ComboBlocks: from n/a through 2.2.86.

item.title: CVE-2023-40557|2024-08-02T18:38:50.334Z -- pickplugins -- tabs%20%26%20accordion
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in PickPlugins Tabs & Accordion allows Code Injection.This issue affects Tabs & Accordion: from n/a through 1.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2023-7072|2024-08-02T08:50:08.113Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%2C%20form%20maker%2C%20popup%20maker%2C%20woocommerce%20blocks%2C%20post%20blocks%2C%20post%20carousel%20%E2%80%93%20combo%20blocks
item.description: The Post Grid Combo – 36+ Gutenberg Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.68 via the 'get_posts' REST API Endpoint. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including full draft posts and password protected posts, as well as the password for password-protected posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-32816|2024-08-02T02:20:35.322Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid.This issue affects Post Grid: from n/a through 2.2.78.

item.title: CVE-2024-29097|2024-08-02T01:03:51.929Z -- pickplugins -- user%20profile
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins User profile allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User profile: from n/a through 2.0.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-1988|2024-08-01T18:56:22.433Z -- pickplugins -- gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20comboblocks
item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' attribute in blocks in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1641|2024-08-01T18:48:21.807Z -- pickplugins -- accordion
item.description: The Accordion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'accordions_duplicate_post_as_draft' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.96. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to duplicate arbitrary posts, allowing access to the contents of password-protected posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-32816|2024-07-24T19:43:42.369Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid.This issue affects Post Grid: from n/a through 2.2.78.

item.title: CVE-2024-38722|2024-07-20T07:21:18.298Z -- pickplugins -- job%20board%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Job Board Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Job Board Manager: from n/a through 2.1.57.

item.title: CVE-2024-3608|2024-07-10T21:17:23.322Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: The Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the product_designer_ajax_delete_attach_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.33. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-3155|2024-06-06T17:03:13.119Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%2C%20form%20maker%2C%20popup%20maker%2C%20woocommerce%20blocks%2C%20post%20blocks%2C%20post%20carousel%20%E2%80%93%20combo%20blocks
item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-31277|2024-04-07T17:24:01.823Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in PickPlugins Product Designer.This issue affects Product Designer: from n/a through 1.0.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-30441|2024-03-29T17:15:05.220Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post Grid: from n/a through 2.2.74.

item.title: CVE-2024-32816|2024-04-24T07:41:31.530Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid.This issue affects Post Grid: from n/a through 2.2.78.

item.title: CVE-2024-4042|2024-06-07T16:55:01.538Z -- pickplugins -- gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20comboblocks
item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'class' attribute of the menu-wrap-item block in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-29097|2024-06-04T17:57:47.179Z -- pickplugins -- user%20profile
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins User profile allows Stored XSS.This issue affects User profile: from n/a through 2.0.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-1641|2024-06-04T18:00:11.715Z -- pickplugins -- accordion
item.description: The Accordion plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'accordions_duplicate_post_as_draft' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.96. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to duplicate arbitrary posts, allowing access to the contents of password-protected posts.

item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'tag' attribute in blocks in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Post Grid Combo – 36+ Gutenberg Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.68 via the 'get_posts' REST API Endpoint. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including full draft posts and password protected posts, as well as the password for password-protected posts.

item.title: CVE-2023-40557|2024-06-04T17:19:06.935Z -- pickplugins -- tabs%20%26%20accordion
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in PickPlugins Tabs & Accordion allows Code Injection.This issue affects Tabs & Accordion: from n/a through 1.3.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-3608|2024-07-09T08:33:04.165Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: The Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the product_designer_ajax_delete_attach_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.33. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-31277|2024-07-12T16:18:14.534Z -- pickplugins -- product%20designer
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in PickPlugins Product Designer.This issue affects Product Designer: from n/a through 1.0.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-38722|2024-07-24T13:47:50.896Z -- pickplugins -- job%20board%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Job Board Manager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Job Board Manager: from n/a through 2.1.57.

item.title: CVE-2024-6346|2024-08-01T09:29:47.875Z -- pickplugins -- gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20comboblocks
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder – ComboBlocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the redirectURL parameter of the Date Countdown widget, in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.85a due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-3155|2024-08-01T20:05:07.517Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%2C%20form%20maker%2C%20popup%20maker%2C%20woocommerce%20blocks%2C%20post%20blocks%2C%20post%20carousel%20%E2%80%93%20combo%20blocks
item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-4042|2024-08-01T20:26:57.268Z -- pickplugins -- gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20comboblocks
item.description: The Post Grid, Form Maker, Popup Maker, WooCommerce Blocks, Post Blocks, Post Carousel – Combo Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'class' attribute of the menu-wrap-item block in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.80 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Product Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the product_designer_ajax_delete_attach_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.33. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary attachments.

item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder – ComboBlocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the redirectURL parameter of the Date Countdown widget, in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.85a due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-30441|2024-08-08T18:44:57.933Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Post Grid: from n/a through 2.2.74.

item.title: CVE-2024-7588|2024-08-14T04:29:54.973Z -- pickplugins -- gutenberg%20blocks%2C%20page%20builder%20%E2%80%93%20comboblocks
item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder – ComboBlocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Accordion block in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.87 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.description: The Gutenberg Blocks, Page Builder – ComboBlocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Accordion block in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.87 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
